amendment.description: To ensure protection of old-growth stands.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2030 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 32. Record Vote Number: 425.
Amendment SA 2030 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR 10/31/2003 S13621-13624; text: CR 10/31/2003 S13621) To ensure protection of old-growth stands.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2030 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 32. Record Vote Number: 425.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2030 proposed by Senator Murray.
